response.original_title: Ce que l'on fait de ce qu'ils ont fait de nous
response.overview: A webdocumentary about the place of homophobia in the life of 11 gay and lesbian men living in Rennes in 2021. This documentary asks the question of how to get back on track, how to deal with all this, what "living as a fag" means for guys between 20 and 30 years old. The title "What we do is what they did to us" raises the question of the existence of a collective experience. And how to take back the control.
response.title: Ce que l'on fait de ce qu'ils ont fait de nous
